body.name: Spy Spot 4G Hard Wire Kill Switch GPS Vehicle Tracker - Remotely Disable the Ignition from Any Location - Locator Tracking Device - Black, 2 x 1.8 x 1 inches - US Coverage, Subscription required
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 24 mins
features: 4G Hard wire kill switch GPS vehicle tracker includes a kill switch relay which allows the ignition to be remotely disabled from a smart phone, tablet, or computer from any location
Real-time updates: The GPS Tracking portal provides information such as the miles per hour, location, satellite view, street view, breadcrumb trail, six month history log
Easy installation behind the dashboard - can be installed at any audio shop or auto repair shop. Instant notifications if vehicle enters or exits a certain area as well as excessive speed alerts
The tracking system works in United States, Canada, and Mexico. No contract required

Monthly service as low as $18/month when year paid for in advance. $20/month when paid 6 months in advance. $22/month when paid 3 months in advance. $24 when paid month to month. Can be cancelled anytime. One time activation fee of $9.95 Tracking now works in United States, Canada, and Mexico!

New low cost plan available for as low as $9.95 for 12 months of service. $11.95 for the 6 month service plan. $13.95 for the 3 month service plan. $15.95 month to month plan available.This plan will provide updates Once per Hour ONLY. It will not provide ignition on or off or excessive speed alerts. It will only show the speed when it updates once per hour.
body.description: The Hard Wire Tracker and Kill Switch is a GPS Tracker that installs behind the dashboard. The tracker updates every minute and can be installed at any audio shop or auto repair shop. The Kill Switch is used to remotely disable the ignition from any location using your phone or computer. The Hard Wire Tracker will provide up to a one year report history of all events including the miles per hour, ignition on/off, motion detected and stopped, as well as several other events. No contract required. Monthly service as low as $18/month when year paid for in advance. $20/month when paid 6 months in advance. $22/month when paid 3 months in advance. $24 when paid month to month. Can be cancelled anytime. One time activation fee of $9.95 Tracking now works in United States, Canada, and Mexico!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better then viper alarms
reviews.reviewText: I love this product am able to locate and killed the engine on my truck. Connection the GPS and kill switch is very difficult. It took me about four hours to do some research and look for ignition wire. The technician support was helpful but was still not easy. I tried to get alarm installer to install it but the price to get it installed was pricey. I wished that the hardwired was plug and play. The GPS is off about 50 feet and when vehicle is parked for a few days. The GPS will send text messages saying it out perimeter which that not true. My nephew decided to go for joy ride with my truck and I was receiving texts on engine is on, speeds , with location. I was able to kill the engine immediately. My nephew and friends were stranded. I received call from him 45 minutes later saying that he had emergency and needed the truck he was sorry but now the truck is stalled won’t start. Lol. Now , when I leave I disable it. I love this product. I wish the monthly subscription was cheaper with the same abilities . They do have cheaper plans but are limited to what you can do with the GPS. This is better then any alarm system plus a lot cheaper than vipers alarms. I haven’t seen car alarm that you can kill the engine immediately. This is better than Onstar because You will need a police officer to assist you with Onstar to recover your vehicle. This product you can recover you vehicle without any assistance.

reviews.reviewText: Install was very easy! The app is basic but understandable and provides enough information to verify speed and location. When I had a couple of questions customer service responded in minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband because he let's people rent out his car online. He uses it when people don't bring the car back or are just riding around when they should be heading to drop off location. He can shut it off with his phone but the car won't be disabled til they shut the car off. The GPS is accurate but the only thing is that you can't see anything after 250 stops. I'm not sure if you have to upgrade it to see more. FOR THE PRICE IT IS GREAT AND DOES WHAT ITS SUPPOSED TO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would definitely do business again
reviews.reviewText: We installed the spy spot in my teenage daughters car so far everything works perfectly as described. Today I had to contact customer services at spyspot I emailed them about a issue ( user issue) and the person that took my email was perfect. Respond to my email promptly was literally 30 min and they got back to me and it worked. Will be doing business again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have yet to attempt to install the unit. The instructions are very bland, no mounting diagrams and the instructions are poor. The unit itself looks to be very solid but don’t inspect any how make or models for hard wiring this in. I may end up taking and having it professionally installed.
